sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { getPostById } from "../../managers/PostManager" import { FaUserCircle } from 'react-icons/fa' export const PostDetails = ({ userId }) => { const [post, setPost] = useState({}) const { postId } = useParams() let navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(() => { getPostById(postId).then(postData => setPost(postData)) }, [postId]) return

{post.title}

{navigate(`/users/${post?.user?.id}`)}} style= {{cursor:"pointer"}}/>

{post?.user?.user?.first_name} {post?.user?.user?.last_name}

@{post?.user?.user?.username}

{post.content}
{post.publication_date}
View Comments Add Comments { parseInt(userId) === post.user?.id ? Edit : <> }
}
